summary: Take a novice destruction spell tome (flames, frostbite, and sparks) alongside the corresponding elemental salts (fire, frost, and void) to a cookingpot to craft a stronger version of the spell, that does a base 10 damage instead of 8, with the same magicka cost.
descriptionHtml: Take a novice destruction spell tome (flames, frostbite, and sparks) alongside the corresponding elemental salts (fire, frost, and void) to a cookingpot to craft a stronger version of the spell, that does a base 10 damage instead of 8, with the same magicka cost.
author: LunarMagister7
